statement.tex: \text{Find the slope of the tangent to the curve}\\ \quad y = 3x^4 - 4x\text{ at } x = 4.
\\ \text{Which of the two graphs correctly shows}\\ \text{the tangent at point P} (x=4)?

reason.tex: \text{A tangent would only graze the curve at}\\ \text{point P - not cut through it.}
\text{The slope of the tangent is simply }\frac{dy}{dx}.
